medical_history.chief_complaint: Symmetrical edema of the lower limbs and inflammatory muscle and joint pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed these symptoms after four cycles of pembrolizumab. Initial symptoms included transitory elevation of eosinophil count and CTCAE grade 2 asthenia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of locally advanced non-small-cell lung carcinoma (NSCLC) treated with radiochemotherapy and subsequent adrenal relapse.
